content.description:
A nice yellow cascade of ice. Nothing complicated and easy to protect. Abit before the mine pit, on the left there's a path that reach the top to install a top rope.

From Coleraine take the Chemin de Vimy, the first parking is next to a fence on the right. Follow the path and the ice should be on the left after a short walk (3-5min).
Screws

climbs.name: Kamikaze
climbs.fa: Jean Blais, Michel Guérette, Jacque Mathieu et Nicolas Rodrigue, 03/1994

content.description:
Beautiful waterfall in step, possibility of a start in grade 4 plus on the left if not in grade 3 in the center.

Belle cascade en pallier, possibilité d'un départ en grade 4 plus a gauche sinon en grade 3 au centre.



From Coleraine, after the dead tree section look for a treeless path on the right. Climb up the path and then at the top of the stone pile go to the left. You will reach a boulder field. Kamikaze is at the top left and Cul-de-sac is 30m to the left of it.

En partant de Coleraine, après la section d'arbre mort cherchez un chemin sans arbre a droite. Montez dans le chemin puis en haut du tat de pierre dirigez vous vers la gauche. Vous atteindrez un pierriez. Kamikaze est en haut a gauche et La voie de cul est 30m a gauche de cette dernière.

Ice screws

Small village near Black Lake

Petit village au sud de Black Lake.
